queries: code file contributing 'condition' field to first fieldset of offers in admin interface
code file enabling creation, update, and deletion of offers in e-commerce project admin panel
file defining admin interface for managing offers in Django-Oscar based e-commerce project
implementation file for managing offers in Django-Oscar e-commerce project admin interface
purpose of this code file is to define the admin interface for managing offers in our e-commerce project based on Django-Oscar

this code file enables the creation, update, and deletion of offers through the admin panel of our e-commerce project, and provides an intuitive interface for handling various aspects of offers, such as conditions, benefits, start and end dates, priority, and usage statistics
